value:
LabCam
LabCam is an IOS & Android App to associate a camera in a mobile device with cloud storage in your Keeper account. This can be used to visually document laboratory experiments, but also to share impressions from e.g. conferences or fieldwork with colleagues “in real time”. OCR (optical character recognition) allows to extract and store text from photos, generated .md-files can subsequently be edited.

Get LabCam (Android)

Get LabCam (IOS)
